Then 5<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mL DMF solution of btx (0.1<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol) was added and continuously stirred for 10<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>min. The mixture solution was filtered and stood for one month to give colorless single crystals of <ce:bold>1</ce:bold> (0.041<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g, 68% yield). Anal. Found: C, 41.82%; H, 2.61%; N, 6.91%. IR data (cm<ce:sup loc="post">−1</ce:sup>): 3436<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>m, 1621s, 1542s, 1487w, 1447w, 1408s, 1257w, 1087w, 1056w, 843w, 758<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>m, 710w, 661w, 503w.</ce:para><ce:section-title id="st025">Synthesis of {[Zn(btx)(1,3-bdc)]·2H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O·(DMF)}<ce:italic>

</ce:italic> (<ce:bold>2</ce:bold>)</ce:section-title><ce:para id="p0035" view="all">A solution of 1,3-H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>bdc (0.2<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol) in 10<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mL of H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O was adjusted to pH 6 with 0.35<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mL of a 1.0<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>M NaOH solution and Zn(NO<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>·6H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O (0.2<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol) was added with stirring. Then 5<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mL DMF solution of btx (0.2<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol) was added and continuously stirred for 10<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>min. The mixture solution was filtered and stood for one month to give colorless single crystals of <ce:bold>2</ce:bold> (0.067<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g, 61% yield). Anal. Calcd. for C<ce:inf loc="post">21</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">23</ce:inf>N<ce:inf loc="post">7</ce:inf>O<ce:inf loc="post">7</ce:inf>Zn (<ce:bold>2</ce:bold>) C, 45.79; H, 4.21; N, 7.80. Found: C, 45.65%; H, 4.13%; N, 7.72%. IR data (cm<ce:sup loc="post">−1</ce:sup>): 3382s, 3164m, 1621s, 1566s, 1448w, 1384s, 1244w, 1156w, 1099w, 1044w, 849w, 747w, 722m, 637w, 540w.</ce:para><ce:section-title id="st030">Synthesis of [Zn(btx)(1,4-bdc)]·3H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O (<ce:bold>3</ce:bold>)</ce:section-title><ce:para id="p0040" view="all">A solution of 1,4-H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>bdc (0.2<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol) in 10<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mL of H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O was adjusted to pH 6 with 0.35<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mL of a 1.0<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>M NaOH solution and Zn(NO<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>·6H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O (0.2<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol) was added with stirring. Then 5<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mL DMF solution of btx (0.2<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol) was added and continuously stirred for 10<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>min. The mixture solution was filtered and stood for one month to give colorless single crystals of <ce:bold>3</ce:bold> (0.064<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g, 65% yield). Anal. Calcd. for C<ce:inf loc="post">18</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">18</ce:inf>N<ce:inf loc="post">6</ce:inf>O<ce:inf loc="post">7</ce:inf>Zn (<ce:bold>3</ce:bold>) C, 43.61; H, 3.66; N, 16.96. Found: C, 43.52%; H, 3.60%; N, 16.89%. IR data (cm<ce:sup loc="post">−1</ce:sup>): 3430s, 1572s, 1542s, 1437w, 1390s, 1318w, 1257w, 1099m, 1050w, 1013w, 837m, 752m, 625w, 528w.</ce:para>
clean_text:
Synthesis of {[Zn2(btx)0.5(1,2-bdc)2(H2O)]⋅H2O} n  (1)

A solution of 1,2-H2bdc (0.2mmol) in 10mL of H2O was adjusted to pH 6 with 0.35mL of a 1.0M NaOH solution and Zn(NO3)2⋅6H2O (0.2mmol) was added with stirring. Then 5mL DMF solution of btx (0.1mmol) was added and continuously stirred for 10min. The mixture solution was filtered and stood for one month to give colorless single crystals of 1 (0.041g, 68% yield). Anal. Calcd. for C21H16N3O10Zn2 (1) C, 41.96; H, 2.68; N, 6.99. Found: C, 41.82%; H, 2.61%; N, 6.91%. IR data (cm-1): 3436m, 1621s, 1542s, 1487w, 1447w, 1408s, 1257w, 1087w, 1056w, 843w, 758m, 710w, 661w, 503w.

Synthesis of {[Zn(btx)(1,3-bdc)]⋅2H2O⋅(DMF)} n  (2)

A solution of 1,3-H2bdc (0.2mmol) in 10mL of H2O was adjusted to pH 6 with 0.35mL of a 1.0M NaOH solution and Zn(NO3)2⋅6H2O (0.2mmol) was added with stirring. Then 5mL DMF solution of btx (0.2mmol) was added and continuously stirred for 10min. The mixture solution was filtered and stood for one month to give colorless single crystals of 2 (0.067g, 61% yield). Anal. Calcd. for C21H23N7O7Zn (2) C, 45.79; H, 4.21; N, 7.80. Found: C, 45.65%; H, 4.13%; N, 7.72%. IR data (cm-1): 3382s, 3164m, 1621s, 1566s, 1448w, 1384s, 1244w, 1156w, 1099w, 1044w, 849w, 747w, 722m, 637w, 540w.

Synthesis of [Zn(btx)(1,4-bdc)]⋅3H2O (3)

A solution of 1,4-H2bdc (0.2mmol) in 10mL of H2O was adjusted to pH 6 with 0.35mL of a 1.0M NaOH solution and Zn(NO3)2⋅6H2O (0.2mmol) was added with stirring. Then 5mL DMF solution of btx (0.2mmol) was added and continuously stirred for 10min. The mixture solution was filtered and stood for one month to give colorless single crystals of 3 (0.064g, 65% yield). Anal. Calcd. for C18H18N6O7Zn (3) C, 43.61; H, 3.66; N, 16.96. Found: C, 43.52%; H, 3.60%; N, 16.89%. IR data (cm-1): 3430s, 1572s, 1542s, 1437w, 1390s, 1318w, 1257w, 1099m, 1050w, 1013w, 837m, 752m, 625w, 528w.
